settings.title: INTRODUCING THE ALL NEW ALLEN SMART SUCTION™ BIKE RACK

settings.text:
Experience the ultimate in bicycle transportation technology with the AllenSmartSuction™ Bike Rack. Featuring a patented design and innovative smartphone app integration, this cutting-edge system continually monitors the suction pressure at the vehicle attachment points, ensuring your bicycle is firmly secured during transit for unrivaled peace of mind.

Let's Explore How It Works!

settings.title: WHAT IS ALLEN SMART SUCTION™ TECHNOLOGY?
settings.text: It is a patented design with the ALLEN smartphone app integration that monitors suction pressure (real-time), ensuring your bike is secure during transport, giving you peace of mind on the road.

settings.title: 4 Smart Suction™ Cups
settings.text: Each of the 4 suction cups provides constant feedback to the app to ensure a strong, reliable, secure fit to your vehicle while on the road.

settings.title: Adaptable Mounting
settings.text: The rack is designed for a variety of bikes and mounting configurations from standard fork, 12mm, 15mm Mountain, Gravel and Road Bikes.

settings.title: EXTEND & SECURE
settings.text: The rack is designed to extend in length to fit almost any type of bike and the rear secure strap can be attached in either direction for ease of use

settings.title: Deluxe+ Features
settings.text: Our Deluxe+ trunk racks have many of the same features as the Deluxe racks. However, instead of the pin, set up and folding is done with a quick-use lever.

settings.title: Premier Features
settings.text: Our Premier trunk rack has the same quick-fold feature as the Deluxe+ rack but with a few other unique elements as well. These include a wide foot profile to better distribute load and quick-secure cradle straps.

settings.title: DESIGNED for versatility
settings.text: The Allen Smart Suction™ Bike Rack can be mounted on a variety of vehicles, provided there is a clean, flat surface. This allows the rack to be flexible and securely mounted to vehicles that might otherwise be impossible for traditional bike racks.

settings.title: Regular
settings.text:
Our regular deluxe hitch rack requires a bit more set up to use. Both the carry arms and gate access are mechanized by a quick release clip.

Additionally, the rack is secured into the hitch via a no-wobble bolt.

settings.title: Quick Install
settings.text: The Deluxe Quick-Install rack is unique in that it contains many of the elements of the regular Deluxe rack but is easier to take on and off your hitch. A patented, quick-install hitch insert secures and tightens your rack inside of your receiver hitch, making installation a breeze.

settings.title: Locking
settings.text: Our Deluxe Locking rack takes this a step further and allows you to lock the rack inside of your hitch, not only making installation a breeze, but also providing extra security and ease of mind.

settings.title: Quick-Secure Cradle straps
settings.text: Ensures a fast and super secure hold on your bike from various angles & positions.

settings.title: Padded spine
settings.text: Provides added protection for your bike and car when on the road and on the go!

settings.title: Easy tilt-away
settings.text: Gives you easy access to the rear of your car and allows you to keep the rack attached for long term use.

Our basic Premier rack also comes with the easy tilt feature and quick-fold-arms introduced in the Deluxe+ rack, as well as the rubber quick-secure cradle straps from the Premier trunk rack. The new and unique feature of the Premier hitch rack is the padded spine.

The large padded spine shield protects your bicycles from the rack and an included tie-down strap helps you keep everything in place while you're driving.

The only difference between the Quick-Install Locking Premier Hitch rack and the regular Premier Hitch rack is that patented locking feature!
